Nightstrike:

Nightstrike was behind his bro 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireStrike::
> "SwitchBlade, Unit FireStrike and NightStrike reporting for 
service, 
> Sir" he said to SwitchBlade through his comm link.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > --- Switchblade ---
> > 
> > Switchblade smiles as he relaxes in the chair, "Probably... 
> > Motormaster, would you like to explain what you were doing there, 
> > molesting the console like that!" Switchblade's smile widdens 
even 
> > more as he peers up at the tell bot.
> > 
> > 
> > On 4 Jun 2001, at 19:27, robertdahl wrote:
> > 
> > > "We have a spy working right now, on checking when the Autobots 
> leave,
> > > you will follow them. But first, we have some more troops to 
> obtain."
> > > One of the council Members says.
> > > 
> > > Slugslinger and Apeface move back from the angered Havotron, but
> > > Spinister dosent seem disturbed. 
> > > 
> > > "Come now, there is no need for this Havotron" one of the 
Council
> > > members adds. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> > > Motormaster turns and growls at Switchblade, cruel intentions 
> flaring
> > > in his eyes, "I'll feed you to the Terrorcons you little.." He 
is
> > > caught off guard by a swing from Megatron, "You will do nothing 
to
> > > him." Megatron turns his attention. "But I am sure he had a good
> > > reason Switchblade. Motormaster is gruff, but not unstable like 
> the
> > > other Stunticons."
